title: Russia Celebrated Him. Now He’s Accused of Having Troops Shoot Themselves.
summary_full: A lieutenant colonel is on trial after being accused of skimming payments for battlefield injuries. He denies the specifics of Russia’s accusation but acknowledges engaging in a payouts scheme.
summary_public: A lieutenant colonel is on trial after being accused of skimming payments for battlefield injuries. He denies the specifics of Russia’s accusation but acknowledges engaging in a payouts scheme.

RU.label: positive
RU.evidence: Russia Celebrated Him. Now He’s Accused of Having Troops Shoot Themselves.
